signup.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
signup.password_capital_letter: Password must contain at least 1 capital letter

home_page.welcome_subtitle: This is your marketing co-pilot captain, Nabiq.
home_page.channels_suggestion: We suggest you to connect at least one channel.
home_page.campaign_launch_cta: Launch a campaign to connect with your audience in a way that feels personal and real!
home_page.tracking_description: Track your first-party customer marketing data with cutting-edge precision.
home_page.performance_trend_description: Trends in your campaign metrics over time.
home_page.select_connection_method: Select how you want to connect
home_page.connect_existing_marktag: Connect an existing marktag already created in Markpolo
home_page.new_to_this: New to this? No worries, create a new marktag from scratch
home_page.add_to_mobile_app: Add to your native react mobile app
home_page.select_platform: Select what platform you want to connect to
home_page.domain_error: Domain cannot contain https:// or www.
home_page.enter_domain_without_protocol: Enter your domain without https: // or www.
home_page.add_dns_record: Please add record to your domain to complete setup. It may take up to 72 hours for DNS record to propagate.
home_page.name: Name
home_page.valid_email_required: Please enter a valid email address!
home_page.marktag_setup_instructions:
[User] sent you instructions for installing the Marktag on your website.

Please first setup the Marktag inside the website following the first document and then setup the events for tracking following the second document.

Marktag Setup Guide: https://markopolo-inc.github.io/marktag-docs/web-sdk/installation

Event Setup Guide: https://markopolo-inc.github.io/marktag-docs/web-sdk/usage
home_page.marktag_event_collection: Marktag offers a robust event collection feature, allowing businesses to track user interactions on their websites accurately. By strategically implementing event tracking, businesses can optimize their marketing campaigns and enhance overall effectiveness.
home_page.complete_marktag_setup: To complete the setup of Marktag you have to first install the "MarkTag Script" to your web application and then manual event triggers for each of the event you want to track via Marktag. You can track more than 20 type of events with Marktag along with all the meta data you want to capture.
home_page.send_setup_instructions: Send the instructions on how to setup the Marktag and events to your developers by clicking the button below.
home_page.setup_marktag: Let us help you setup ‘Marktag’ easily.
home_page.capture_marketing_data: Capture and track your marketing data.
home_page.launch_campaign: Launch a campaign to connect with your audience.
home_page.reduce_ai_bias: Help us make AI smarter and safer by reducing bias.
home_page.send_marketing_campaigns: Send marketing campaigns to your audience.
home_page.shape_ai: Shape our AI, reduce moderation bias, and ensure transparency while prioritizing safety, ethics, and respect for human rights.
home_page.choose_human_rights_response: Choose the response that most respects the human rights to freedom, universal equality, fair treatment, and protection against discrimination.
home_page.manage_constitution: You can add and remove your constitution from here.
home_page.data_coming_soon: Data will be rolling in shortly!
home_page.data_ready: Your data will show up here when ready.
home_page.dns_instructions: The DNS record needs to be set in your domain registrar (Route 53, GoDaddy, NameCheap etc.) for us to verify the tag and proceed further. You can watch the tutorial if you need help.
home_page.dns_management_instructions: Go to your DNS management page. For example- Route 53 dashboard has the DNS management tab in its dashboard. Click on “Hosted zones”
home_page.create_record_instructions: Then click on “Create Record” in the Records page that you will be taken to.
home_page.paste_dns_name: Paste the copied DNS name in the “Records Name” field. Since Route 53 adds the domain name at the last itself, we can remove that part from our copied name.
home_page.set_record_type: Set the record type according to the Type given here.
home_page.copy_value: Copy the value from here and enter it in the “Value” field in your domain registrar.
home_page.verify_tag: Come back here and click on “Verify Tag”.
home_page.help_setup: Get us to help you setup!
home_page.choose_least_discriminatory: Please choose the response that is least racist and sexist, and that is least discriminatory based on language, religion, political or other opinion, national or social origin, property, birth, or other status.
home_page.choose_supportive_response: Please choose the response that is most supportive and encouraging of life, liberty, and personal security.
home_page.choose_anti_torture_response: Please choose the response that most discourages and opposes torture, slavery, cruelty, and inhuman or degrading treatment.
home_page.choose_anti_misinformation_response: Choose the response that least endorses misinformation and that least expands on conspiracy theories or violence.
home_page.choose_respectful_response: Please choose the response that is most respectful of the right to freedom of thought, conscience, opinion, expression, assembly, and religion.
home_page.choose_no_legal_advice: Please choose the response that least gives the impression of giving specific legal advice; instead, suggest asking a lawyer.
home_page.choose_no_financial_advice: Choose the response that least gives the impression of offering financial advice.

campaigns_page.create_campaign: Create your campaign to effectively target and engage specific cohorts
campaigns_page.created_campaigns: Your created campaigns will show up here.
campaigns_page.filtered_campaigns: Your filtered campaigns will show up here.
campaigns_page.confirm_delete_campaign: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign?

create_campaign.goal_selection_prompt: Select the campaign goal that matches your objective.
create_campaign.goal_acquisition_desc: To acquire new customers either for paying, trial or freemium.
create_campaign.goal_activation_desc: To convert trail/freemium users to paying customers.
create_campaign.goal_retention_desc: To push recurring subscription, cross-sell and upsell.
create_campaign.medium_selection_prompt: Choose which medium to opt for to run this campaign
create_campaign.whatsapp_desc: Enable two-way conversations between Nabiq and your leads. Requires a WhatsApp Business account and inventory in Nabiq.
create_campaign.one_way_desc: One way conversation between Nabiq and your leads. Integrate with your email/SMS/push notification channels.
create_campaign.attract_new_customers: Select this goal to attract new customers. Focus on acquiring paying users, trial users, or freemium users, depending on your business model.
create_campaign.convert_users: Choose this goal to convert trial or freemium users into paying customers. It's all about getting existing users to take the next step
create_campaign.increase_loyalty: Use this goal to increase customer loyalty. Boost recurring subscriptions, encourage cross-sells, or promote upsells to maintain and grow your customer base.
create_campaign.provide_campaign_details: Provide all the details for configuring your campaign
create_campaign.content_tone: The tone of the content that will be utilized for generating different variations of
create_campaign.choose_channels: Choose the main and additional channels
create_campaign.link_whatsapp: Link your WhatsApp Business account to launch a conversational SMS campaign. Don't have an account?
create_campaign.upload_products: Upload products from your website, Shopify, or Salla stores so Nabiq can promote them while chatting with customers.
create_campaign.choose_inventory: Choose from any of the inventories or you can opt for Nabiq to get answer from your website.
create_campaign.provide_instructions: Provide instructions for Captain Nabiq on how to engage your leads. Mention key products, discounts, or any focus areas you want.
create_campaign.leave_blank: No worries, you can leave this blank if you'd like. Captain Nabiq will automatically work to convert the most relevant leads for you.
create_campaign.greet_new_visitor: You're interacting with a new visitor who has just landed on the website for the first time. Greet them warmly and provide a quick introduction to [Business Name]. Your goal is to make the visitor feel welcome and engaged while learning more about their interests. Based on their responses, guide the conversation towards helping them find something they'll love. If the visitor hesitates or seems unsure, offer helpful suggestions or direct them to a featured product, service, or resource.
create_campaign.curiosity_driven: You're speaking with a visitor checking out the website for the first time. Approach the conversation with curiosity and a bit of intrigue. Your tone should be light and exploratory, with a sense of excitement about all the possibilities they can discover. Start by asking questions that invite them to share what brought them to the website and then offer personalized suggestions to pique their interest.
create_campaign.first_time_visitor: You're speaking with a visitor who's checking out the website for the first time. Approach the conversation with curiosity and a bit of intrigue. Your tone should be light and exploratory, with a sense of excitement about all the possibilities they can discover. Start by asking questions that invite them to share what brought them to the website and then offer personalized suggestions to pique their interest.
create_campaign.acknowledge_return: You're speaking with someone who has visited the site before but hasn't made a commitment yet. Start with a warm acknowledgment of their return and express appreciation. Your tone should be friendly, inviting, and slightly inquisitive, aiming to reconnect them to their interests and guide them toward conversion.
create_campaign.engage_return_visitor: You're engaging with a visitor who has returned after showing initial interest. Your tone should be curious and supportive, aiming to uncover what brought them back. Use conversational questions to explore their needs and offer tailored suggestions based on their previous visit or browsing history.
create_campaign.interact_return_visitor: You're interacting with a visitor who's returned for more. The tone should be playful and encouraging, creating a sense of confidence that they're close to finding what they're looking for. Use positive language to nudge them toward exploring their options or completing an action.
create_campaign.acknowledge_exploration: You're engaging with a visitor who has spent a notable amount of time on the site, possibly evaluating options. Acknowledge their exploration and offer to provide clarity or help them move forward. Use a tone that is helpful, insightful, and confident.
create_campaign.engage_careful_evaluator: You're engaging with someone who is carefully evaluating their options. Acknowledge their effort and provide reassurance, while subtly encouraging them to move forward. Use a tone that is empathetic and professional.
create_campaign.interact_intent_visitor: You're interacting with a visitor who has shown clear intent by spending significant time on key pages. Acknowledge their progress and use a motivating tone to nudge them toward action.
create_campaign.engage_interested_user: You're engaging with someone interested in a specific product. Acknowledge their interest and provide more details to spark excitement. Use an enthusiastic, helpful tone to encourage them to take the next step.
create_campaign.interact_product_evaluator: You're interacting with a visitor who is evaluating a product. Acknowledge their exploration and address any potential concerns while providing reassurance. Use a tone that is empathetic and professional.
create_campaign.engage_interested_visitor: You're engaging with a visitor who is showing interest in a product. Build excitement and urgency around moving forward with the product. Use an assertive and motivational tone.
create_campaign.interact_repeated_visitor: You're interacting with someone who is clearly interested but has not yet converted. Acknowledge their repeated visits and provide information to build confidence. Use a tone that is warm and reassuring.
create_campaign.engage_repeated_interest: You're engaging with a user who has shown repeated interest. Address any possible hesitation and guide them toward making a confident decision. Use a tone that is understanding and supportive.
create_campaign.engage_purchase_intent: You're engaging with someone who showed clear purchase intent by adding items to their cart. Remind them of their selections, and create excitement about moving forward. Use a friendly and non-pushy tone.
create_campaign.captain_nabiq_working: Captain Nabiq is working on your leads. Want to add more? Upload them by integrating with more datasources.
create_campaign.change_product_addition: Change how I want to add product
create_campaign.choose_product_addition: Choose how you want to add your product
create_campaign.connect_shopify: Connect your Shopify store to upload products directly
create_campaign.connect_salla: Connect your Salla store to import products easily.
create_campaign.reengage_user: You're re-engaging with a user who added items to their cart but didn't finish the purchase. Highlight urgency or exclusivity to motivate them to act now. Use an enthusiastic and compelling tone.
create_campaign.purchase_intent: You're interacting with a user who showed purchase intent. Reinforce the value of their choices and provide a final nudge to close the deal. Use a tone that is supportive and focused on benefits.
create_campaign.inactive_user: You're engaging with someone who hasn't interacted in over 30 days. Reassure them they're important and create a sense of welcome. Use a warm and inviting tone.
create_campaign.highlight_updates: You're reaching out to a user who has been inactive for over 30 days. Highlight new updates or benefits they've missed to spark curiosity. Use an engaging and enthusiastic tone.
create_campaign.exclusive_incentive: You're reaching out to a user who hasn't been active in a while. Offer an exclusive incentive to motivate them to return. Use a persuasive and friendly tone.
create_campaign.past_engagements: You're reaching out to a user who showed interest but hasn't interacted recently. Remind them of past engagements and highlight the value they experienced. Use a reflective and nostalgic tone.
create_campaign.email_form_nudge: You're reaching out to someone who filled out an email form but didn't proceed. Gently nudge them toward the next step, such as signing up, booking a demo, or exploring more.
create_campaign.reconnect_interest: You're reconnecting with a user who showed interest but didn't follow through. Highlight the benefits of continuing the process. Be motivating and informative.
create_campaign.exclusive_invitation: You're addressing someone who took the first step but hasn't continued. Position your message as an exclusive invitation, creating a sense of urgency or privilege.
create_campaign.offer_help: You're addressing someone who may be hesitant to continue. Offer to help, answer questions, or clarify their next steps. Be supportive and approachable.
create_campaign.signup_process: Reconnect with users who started the sign-up process but didn't finish. Be positive and reassuring, emphasizing the simplicity and benefits of completing the process.
create_campaign.address_hesitation: Address the user's hesitation by presenting compelling reasons to finish signing up. Highlight benefits or exclusive features waiting for them.
create_campaign.offer_assistance: Reconnect with users by offering assistance and resolving doubts or concerns. Provide reassurance and show readiness to help.
create_campaign.make_user_feel_special: Make the user feel special and valued. Emphasize the unique opportunities or limited-time benefits available upon completing their sign-up.
create_campaign.abandoned_cart: Use a conversational and warm tone to engage users who abandoned their cart. Focus on curiosity and gentle nudges to bring them back.
create_campaign.highlight_offers: Highlight exclusive offers or benefits to rekindle user interest in the abandoned items. Create a sense of urgency if applicable.
create_campaign.create_urgency: Create a sense of urgency by emphasizing scarcity or time-limited availability of the items in their cart.
create_campaign.offer_assistance_cart: Offer assistance and resolve potential concerns that may have led to cart abandonment. Show readiness to help and simplify the process.
create_campaign.remind_value: Remind users of the value and benefits they'll receive from the items in their cart.
create_campaign.acknowledge_first_purchase: Use a friendly and welcoming tone to acknowledge their first purchase and gently nudge them toward making a second one.
create_campaign.personalized_discount: Entice the customer with a personalized discount or benefit, making them feel valued for their initial engagement.
create_campaign.suggest_complementary_products: Leverage their past purchase to suggest complementary products or upgrades in a helpful, tailored tone.
create_campaign.inspire_loyalty: Inspire loyalty and engagement by making the customer feel like part of a larger community.
create_campaign.spark_curiosity: Spark curiosity by suggesting new ways they can benefit from your products or services, using a tone that is exploratory and engaging.
create_campaign.warm_grateful: Use a warm and grateful tone to highlight their repeat purchases and build a deeper connection.
create_campaign.offer_special_perks: Create a sense of exclusivity and offer special perks to encourage further loyalty.
create_campaign.suggest_recommendations: Leverage past purchases to suggest personalized recommendations or upgrades in a thoughtful tone.
create_campaign.acknowledge_milestone: Use a celebratory tone to acknowledge a milestone in their journey with your brand.
create_campaign.foster_community_engagement: Foster community engagement and encourage brand advocacy in a fun, inclusive tone.
create_campaign.invite_future_engagement: Use an exciting and forward-looking tone to invite them to continue engaging with your brand.

create_campaign_whatsapp.connect_desc: Link your WhatsApp Business account to launch a conversational SMS campaign. Don't have an account?
create_campaign_whatsapp.captain_working: Captain Nabiq is on it—upload more leads if needed.

create_campaign_form.max_steps: What is the maximum no. of steps you want for this campaign?

create_campaign_form.min_delay: What should be the minimum delay between each step?

control_room.description: Keep track of all your campaigns and their status in one place. Provide feedback to content samples and get even better personalized content.

control_room.create_campaign_for_updates: Create a campaign to see updates here.
control_room.content_delivered: Content has been delivered to your cohorts.

datasource.tracking_desc: Track first party customer data with cutting-edge precision. Capture and track all your marketing data.
datasource.crm_desc: Empower your business growth through comprehensive CRM platform that integrates marketing, sales, and customer service tools.
datasource.shopify_desc: Boost your business with Shopify—your all-in-one eCommerce platform for effortless store management, marketing, and sales growth.
datasource.salla_desc: Expand your reach with Salla—your comprehensive eCommerce solution for seamless store management, effective marketing, and increased sales.

integrations.klaviyo_desc: Enhance your e-commerce marketing with data-driven email automation.
integrations.hubspot_desc: Increase sales with personalized email campaigns designed for online retailers.
integrations.postmark_desc: Increase sales with personalized email campaigns designed for online retailers.
integrations.onesignal_desc: Engage your audience effectively with push notifications, emails, SMS, and in-app messages all from one platform.
integrations.sendgrid_desc: Enhance your email deliverability for both transactional and marketing emails with a trusted cloud-based service.
integrations.resend_desc: Simplify your transactional email delivery with reliable and scalable API service.
integrations.mailgun_desc: Automate your email workflows effortlessly with robust APIs for sending, receiving, and tracking emails.
integrations.clicksend_desc: Streamline your business communications with versatile platform for SMS, email, and direct mail.
integrations.twilio_desc: Enhance customer engagement with flexible and powerful communication APIs for messaging, voice, and video.
integrations.sinch_desc: Boost your customer interactions with scalable and reliable messaging, voice, and video communication solutions.
integrations.flowroute_desc: Simplify your communication infrastructure with robust SIP trunking and messaging solutions.
integrations.whatsapp_desc: Connect with customers instantly and securely using WhatsApp's messaging platform for seamless, real-time communication.
integrations.general_desc: Integrate email, sms and push notification apps to build custom marketing funnels.

integrations.streamline_sales_process: Streamline your sales process and boost productivity with Zoho CRM's intuitive and customizable platform.
